name: Dragon's Fury
description:
In the tower defense game Dragon’s Fury, be the dragon! Tunnel under your lair to retrieve the stolen treasure from the greedy dwarf’s underground cavern. 

Defeat waves of dwarves to beat the level, and improve your high score! 

Place and upgrade draconic spells to defend before they climb up to retrieve it.  Use rubies to gain the Fury attack, and emeralds to empower adjacent spells. If enemies reach your treasure trove, they will take some of your gold. If you drop below 0, you lose.

Draconic spells: 

1. Scale Shooter: Moderate damage nearby enemies. Start by building these 

2. Fire Blast: Small area of effect that does damage to all nearby enemies. Good for big waves. 

3. Lava Ball: Huge damage that rolls directly downward, hitting everything in its path. Wrecks long downward tunnels. 

4. Frost Spell: Small area of effect that slows nearby enemies.

All art, code, music, and other assets made by the team of Liam, Austin, and Arlan.
